mapper.select: SELECT cName, cId, cTel, cPhoneNumber, cQNumber, cEmail, cUsername, cPwd, cUnit FROM client
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client(cName, cId, cTel, cPhoneNumber, cQNumber, cEmail, cUsername, cPwd, cUnit) VALUES (#{cName},#{cId},#{cTel},#{cPhoneNumber},#{cQNumber},#{cEmail},#{cUsername},#{cPwd},#{cUnit})
mapper.select: SELECT cName, cId, cTel, cPhoneNumber, cQNumber, cEmail, cUsername, cPwd, cUnit FROM client WHERE cUsername=#{cUserName}
SELECT cName, cId, cTel, cPhoneNumber, cQNumber, cEmail, cUsername, cPwd, cUnit FROM client WHERE cId=#{cId}

SELECT * INTO OUTFILE #{path} FIELDS TERMINATED BY ',' CHARACTER SET gbk LINES TERMINATED BY '\n' FROM (SELECT 'cName', 'cId', 'cTel', 'cPhoneNumber', 'cQNumber', 'cEmail', 'cUsername', 'cUnit' UNION SELECT cName, cId, cTel, cPhoneNumber, cQNumber, cEmail, cUsername, cUnit from client) b

SELECT cName, cId, cTel, cPhoneNumber, cQNumber, cEmail, cUsername, cPwd, cUnit From client WHERE CONCAT_WS(`cName`, `cId`, `cTel`, `cPhoneNumber`, `cQNumber`, `cEmail`, `cUsername`,`cUnit`) like CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%')
